Reviews.Title: “Great location, not great hostel”

Reviews.Content: location wise hostel brilliant glebe fantastic stay sydney cafes galore lots hand book shops type restaurant possibly walk city darling harbour buses outside hostel cost 2 cbd hostel kept clean impressions dissapointing lot camped tiny window smells musty means clothes storage ok cupboard kitchen utensils basic shared knife months biggest hostel mangers time considering shares consequently guy 50 half dampener stay air con didnt time stayed despite told fixed 2 weeks time week complaining plug fan little reception staff unhelpful unapproachable couldnt care hand rent week free laundry usage free machine week free huge bonus hostels charge 4 washing 4 dryer wouldnt stay spent weeks looking staybut saying couldnt cheaper option sydney sort stuck location wise ideal price wise time id extend budget couldnt recommend staying glebe

Reviews.Title: “Great facilities and view, poor service and atmosphere”

Reviews.Content: girlfriend stayed rooftop travellers lodge mid october beginning november started trip australia nice hostel lot amenities tv dvd player pc free internet fridge freezer ensuite bathroom shower shower frequently floods bathroom kitchen usually clean own cupboard store dry food lot stoves ovens microwaves available stove knobs gas missing due kitchen roof fridge transfer food stairs hostel offered free laundry machines washing dryer laundry downright filthy water dripping ceiling guests remove laundry machines able staff friendly indifferent expect air conditioning broken bad stayed summer hot noise sometimes annoying people running hallways stench weed nearly hostel matter roof location money youre 1520 minute walk cbd major shopping centre nearby nice hostel dont expect world
